original: 久聞將軍威名，若無士兵相助，<color=#b6f8f4>$leader1</color>可有膽與本姑娘一戰？(選擇拒絕將減少我方士氣值200)
text: I have heard of the general's reputation for a long time, if there is no soldier to help, <color=#b6f8f4>$leader1</color> can you have the guts to fight this girl? (Choose to refuse will reduce our morale by 200)
